title: Helping with Adventurer Party Management - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Business Management   Crafting   Cunning Protagonist   Different Social Status   Economics   Farming   Friendship   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Industrialization   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Multiple POV   Nobles   Politics   Sword And Magic   Time Skip
author: Daisuke   ダイスケ
description:
“I guess, it’s all right to quit being an adventurer, right?”

Right after retiring, a tale of the supporter of newbie adventurers. No cheats, just plain-old normal developments.

At first, it’s just individual counseling, then onwards to make supporting a business venture.>
